headline: Trump Trade: Fannie, Freddie ordered to explore crypto as federal mortgage asset
summary: Catch up on the top industries and stocks that were impacted, or were predicted to be impacted, by the comments, actions and policies of President Trump with this daily recap compiled by The Fly: CRYPTO AS FEDERAL MORTGAGE ASSET: FHFA Director William Pulte has ordered Fannie Mae (FNMA) and Freddie Mac (FMCC) to explore crypto as an asset for single-family mortgage applications without converting it to U.S. dollars, CNBC’s MacKenzie Sigalos reports. Only digital assets held on U.S.-regulated, ce

headline: General Dynamics Wins a $1.9B Contract to Aid Virginia Class Submarines
summary: GD secures a contract to supply long-lead materials for Virginia Class submarines through 2035.

raw.headline: General Dynamics Wins a $1.9B Contract to Aid Virginia Class Submarines
raw.summary: GD secures a contract to supply long-lead materials for Virginia Class submarines through 2035.

headline: CT-based company acquires building at mall to use for hundreds of workers
summary: Electric Boat, a business unit of General Dynamics, acquired the space of the former Macy’s department store at the Crystal Mall, according to the company. The Groton-based Electric Boat will have 700 employees working out of the 121,000-square-foot building as early as March 2027, according to the company. Electric Boat, which designs, builds, repairs and modernizes nuclear submarines for the ...
